title: Only Benjy knows: should he tell?
creator_credit: Gary Bergland and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Benjy sees some boys he knows shoplifting. They don’t see him and he doesn’t know whether to tell anyone. Is telling ever justified? This film aims to help students and teachers arrive at some flexible standards for dealing with this troublesome problem.
